Hello !! What's up guys? 😎 ✌

Today we'll check a very simple text logo animation with SVG

Of Course you can create own svg logo in vector based software like ( nowadays most of them have support )figma,adobe... 💻

Export it as SVG and then open it with your IDE and you'll see these elements.

Heres the svg code that i created ⬇ , Actually below svg created with figma !! 😍

```html

```

Lets jump into fun part ! 😎 Starts with CSS Resets & basic styling !!

```css
* {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
body {
	width: 100%;
	height: 100vh;
	background-color: #333f68;
}
.logo {
	position: absolute;
	top: 50%;
	left: 50%;
	transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
.logo path {
	stroke-width: 4;
	stroke: #fc8490;
}
```

To find the total path length ! you can use online tool
[Path Length Calculator](https://codepen.io/gabriellewee/full/EZPYmw) or with javascript see the code below 👇

```javascript
const path = document.querySelectorAll('path');
for (i = 0; i < path.length; i++) {
	console.log(path[i].getTotalLength());
}
//to Know the path total length
const path = document.querySelectorAll('path');
for (i = 0; i < path.length; i++) {
	console.log(path[i].getTotalLength());
}
//you'll get the console like this
// 252.6863555908203
// 302.3053894042969
//...
// 170.38601684570312
```

By the way you'll get the total lengths in console ⬆

```css
.logo path:nth-child(1) {
	stroke-dasharray: 252;
	stroke-dashoffset: 252;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 0s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(2) {
	stroke-dasharray: 302;
	stroke-dashoffset: 302;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 0.5s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(3) {
	stroke-dasharray: 222;
	stroke-dashoffset: 222;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 1s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(4) {
	stroke-dasharray: 75;
	stroke-dashoffset: 75;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 1.5s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(5) {
	stroke-dasharray: 287;
	stroke-dashoffset: 287;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 2s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(6) {
	stroke-dasharray: 407;
	stroke-dashoffset: 407;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 2.5s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(7) {
	stroke-dasharray: 342;
	stroke-dashoffset: 342;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 3s;
}
.logo path:nth-child(8) {
	stroke-dasharray: 170;
	stroke-dashoffset: 170;
	animation: logo 2s forwards ease 3.5s;
}
@keyframes logo {
	to {
		stroke-dashoffset: 0;
	}
}
```
